resources.string: Note: Saavn Pro subscription is required in order to save songs in Saavn app.

In order to save songs from this app, you need to have Saavn Pro. 
 
 Download the song you want to save.
 
 Play that song in Saavn App. 
 
 Pause that song in Saavn App.
 
 Open this App.
 
 Enter the song name and click Save Song.
 
 Your song will be saved in Music folder on SDCARD.
 
 Thank You!
